channel.title: Megahost
channel.description:
Can this guy called megahost be banned please? He's got this website hosting place, he registered on here just only to advertise.
He posts things like "Hey i gotz sojisujfiulution for ur queiitlonz lok ad me email".
I asked for evidence that website was his, when he couldn't get up with it he called me a 8 year old who came on this website to learn how to copy and paste code.
He also doesn't sound older as 7.
Would be appreciated if he would be banned. I hate these kind of people.
